desc: We are your specialist for DNA polymerases, offering to you Taq polymerase, thermostable Reverse Transcriptases, Freeze-dried products, Research Services, PCR, RT-PCR, freeze-dried PCR mixes, PCR Balls, Mastermixes etc. Aditionally we can customize your assays in liquid as well as freeze-dried forms. Just get in touch!

layout.text: Molecular diagnostic services as cutting edge as you are?
